posts.title: My cash-only envelope system
posts.excerpt: Being reasonably organized is important, but the system is only useful if it's easy enough to use, to remember its rules and to analyze its outcomes. Here's how I manage my finance on week to week basis.

posts.title: Living with less
posts.excerpt: Recently I was forced to introduce budget into my life. What I took as an annoyance and necessity ended up being a blessing in disguise that brought me more mental peace, stability and sense of direction in life.
